comments.comment: Congratulations to all these deserving doctors to be Education is a right‚ù§Ô∏èüî•
Good news. I think it is time that students in goverment medical colleges start studying and getting qualified soon instead of becoming cats paw of GMOA and political parties
Education is a right THAT IS TRUE..  BUT GIVING UNAUTHORIZED SERVICE IS WRONG

Yes, Education is a right and government provides almost all the facilities equally for all children and there are certain cut-off points for selecting real geniuses of education. Those who are unable to get through from the standard exams and having plenty of money now can conquer all the barriers for the sake of their monetary power.Fantastic decision.:

You are 100% right and to the point. Next time we go for treatment for any serious illness we will have to first ask the doctor from which medical school he had got his degree. That is whether it is from a private school or from the reputed government medical college. In case he says that his degree is from Saitem or whatever, or any other private sri-lankan medical college we got to get down from the stretcher and walk home without risking our lives.

"government provides almost all the facilities equally for all children" your statement in questionable have you ever visited schools in trincomalee vauniya mulativu thier education standards are not as colombo thogh the z score is low the people who come from outside register their illegally and grab their oppertunity also. "real geniuses of education". True that they are really talented but education is not all about passing exams comprehensive knowledge analytical skills practical applicability are not thoroughly cheked throgh a levels. Just travel aroumd colombo u wil see genius brains in top seats evem without al levels. Saitm should not be abolished but it should be standardized meeting the requirements of medical council.
Thopita Mungen Beheth Ganna Heki Weewa... Thope Awasan Gamana Edaata...... Munta A/L Neee.... Doctor Kenek Wenna Lankaawe A/L Oneee....

Best news.  Students who get 3Cs from rural areas study for free from tax payers money in GOVT medical schools.  Students who cannot study for free from tax payers money will study using their own money and cannot see a problem with that !!  Hopefully they will not join the GMOA and strike when the country is entering into free trade agreements to increase exports.
Onna ithin Sudu pu*a danna tharma.
Dear Migara Please notice that SAITM people do not sit for ACT 16/ ERPM exam. This exam is mandatory for foreign graduates only.
Madamulanaya, rata kawo.
Hoda wede !

There is absolutely no requirement to have 3 As or 3Bs to become a medical doctor as opposed to other branch of science especially Aeronautics or spacecraft. The limited intake to medical faculties in Sri lanka is due to scarcity of resoruces and state funding. The minimum requirement to enter to a prestigious medical faculties in UK is 3Cs. What a fuss in Sri lanka. The mentality and line of thinking of Sri lankans are strange when it comes to the freedom of education. The mindset is rather colonial and hereditary.  The right to education is be protected regardless.

Once i visited Neville Fernando Teaching Hospital where this so called doctors getting trained. A doctor at intern in this hospital was checking the pulse of My brother and i noticed that she is signalling the other doctor beside her that she cant hear anything and the other one signaled to open the stethoscope( There is a protection mechanism adopted in steths to protect the listeners ears from heavy noise due to accidental hit of chest piece while carrying). She does not even know such thing exist in the steth and how do you believe those doctors will give you appropriate care you need ?
That is why they're in the Teaching Hospital - to be trained!
Uba dokek wage  ;)
the best news! these Children also have their human rights!!
Yahamin Mudal thiyana Mee Harakunta Dosthara thanathuru..Dippath daruwo kee denek Ihala Z score thiyagena gewal wala innawada Munta Henama Gahapan
NATAPU NETUMAKUTH NEE GEMO BEREE PALUWAKUTH NEE GEMO

Congratulations, hodama theeranayak. salli walata hari igenaganna kemathi nam igenagena leddunta sevayak karanna oni. oya maha lokuwata kegahan local kattiya inter iwarawuna gaman yannae rata meheta wedak ne nomile igena gaththata. eyalage kuhaka kama witharai. GMOA eke aya dan natai. denna thiyena manasika wada serama dei hospital waladi. eyala ehema thama.
A' Level pass thunak gaththa ekekgen beheth ganna koitharam pera pin kara thiyenna onatha? Hamuduruwaney apata kiya denawada? Pin ganana kiyanna hondey.
M.b.b.s.( saitem)
Yes lookout for that title. We need to avoid these substandard fellows.
Now as foreign graduates we can also go to court and request for registration , if SAITAM students can get registration without doing accessting exam and internship why we should do?

GMOA said if these SAITEM doctors join the service people would die. If we ask people who got treatments from the government hospitals to report who died as a result of mistakes or negligence by government doctors there would be thousands of such reports.
Congratulations for fighting against injustice. We hope at least the mafia will be demolished for ever for the betterment of the country.
